publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1835 Tommy Sheridan: Rise in Rail Fares—That the Parliament condemns the 10% rise in rail fares announced by Virgin Trains; believes that this is a totally unjustifiable rise, and further believes that the ongoing crisis in the railways can only be solved by bringing the railways back into public ownership.

S1M-1835 Tommy Sheridan: Rise in Rail Fares—That the Parliament condemns the 10% rise in rail fares announced by Virgin Trains; believes that this is a totally unjustifiable rise, and further believes that the ongoing crisis in the railways can only be solved by bringing the railways back into public ownership. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-1835 Tommy Sheridan: Rise in Rail Fares—That the Parliament condemns the 10% rise in rail fares announced by Virgin Trains; believes that this is a totally unjustifiable rise, and further believes that the ongoing crisis in the railways can only be solved by bringing the railways back into public ownership. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder

Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder

Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder

Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder
